title: name one change that would make a champ almost broken op
body:
not something like "mundo cleaver now does 90% max health damage"

i mean something simple.

 here ill start: {{champion:37}} now gets powercord after EVERY spell cast

your turn~

EDIT: it cant be something that would actually break the game like instant kill damage or perminent invulnerability
